text: Keiko Furukawa (Japanese:古川 圭子, Furukawa Keiko, real name: Keiko Kamei (亀井圭子)) is an announcer for MBS. She joined the company in 1993. Her birthday is January 30. She is married to Mareo Kamei, who also works at MBS and is two years her senior. ==Appearances== * Television ** MBS News ==External links== *Mainichi Broadcasting System, Inc. title: Keiko Furukawa
